dct_title_s: Transvaal and Orange Free State. Kimberley
dct_description_sm: Digitized by University of Cape Town Libraries, Special collections: Maps scanned under The William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT.

Topographical map indicating Kimberley, Barkly (Klipdrift), Windsorton (Hebron), Warrenton, Rutland and other towns and villages, roads, railways, stations, rivers, vleis, waterfalls, dams, pans, farms, kraals, mines and mountains in the area of Kimberley.
Westernmost longitude incorrectly given as E24Â°00' in lower left corner.
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain. War Office. Intelligence Division.
dct_publisher_sm: Heliozincographed at the Ordnance Survey Office
